name: Projeto Real: Fishing Kit
description: Available fishing kit for you, a fishing enthusiast starting your career.

name: Escape From Inferno
description: Escape From Inferno is a top-down shooter where you play as an angel named Lordrid to escape Hell. There are 10 stages and your goal is to survive the hordes of enemies until there are none left.

name: The Forgotten Cabin!
description: You're placed in a small, isolated house in the midst of a dense forest. The experience is concise, lasting about 10 minutes, during which you witness a series of eerie and potentially supernatural events.

name: Dogs Huddled Together
description: Enjoy a therapeutic dog puzzle game where every piece is an adorable dog. Adjust the difficulty as you like, explore two intriguing puzzle modes, and let hundreds of dogs bring you comfort!

name: Exoprimal: Roadblock Alpha Big Bunny Set
description: Includes 5 cosmetic items, including a suit skin for the tank "Roadblock Alpha", which sets up shields and builds defense lines. The fluffy-bodied rabbit♪ Equip him with cosmetic items and he will protect all of his friends♪

name: Exoprimal: Barrage Alpha Mystic Set
description: Includes 5 cosmetic items, including a suit skin for the assault "Barrage Alpha", which destroys enemies by bombing them with rocket launchers. Mystic, which wears an eerie atmosphere! Equipped with cosmetic items, blow away both enemies and evil spirits with a powerful blast!

name: Exoprimal: Barrage Monster Hunter Set
description: This pack contains five cosmetic items, including a suit skin based on an armour set made from parts of the terrifying Elder Dragon, Nergigante!

name: Exoprimal: Roadblock Monster Hunter Set
description: This pack contains five cosmetic items, including a suit skin which makes your exosuit take on the appearance of the ultra-aggressive Rajang, letting you become destruction incarnate!

name: Exoprimal: Skywave Monster Hunter Set
description: This pack contains five cosmetic items, including a suit skin based on an armour set made from parts of the electrifying Phantom Beast of legend, Kirin!

name: Exoprimal: Deadeye Alpha Deinonychus Body Set
description: Includes 5 cosmetic items, including the Assault "Deadeye Alpha" suit skin, which uses two different types of projectiles to destroy your enemies. A Deinonychus Body that lets you be just like a real dinosaur! Equip yourself with cosmetic items and bring out your wild instincts to fight!

name: Exoprimal: Zephyr Alpha Fire Dragon Set
description: Includes five cosmetic items, including the Assault "Zephyr Alpha" suit skin, which cuts through remote enemies with its chakram. The Flame Dragon, a bright red dragon that seems to be covered in flames! Equip yourself with the cosmetic items and unleash a fiery onslaught like a raging fire!

name: Exoprimal: Witchdoctor Alpha Overlord Set
description: Includes five cosmetic items, including the support "Witchdoctor Alpha" suit skin, which assists allies with a combined offensive and defensive beam. Overlord, the mummy of the monarch who ruled the ancient world! Equip yourself with cosmetic items and pull your allies back from the brink of death!

name: Weekend Romance
description: Margaret is about to enjoy her weekend getaway with her girlfriend, Arabelle, when Arabelle decides to bring two unexpected guests to spice up their romantic life. What would Margaret do when three women want to be intimate with her? Play now!

name: Estellina
description: Just you, the track, and the thrill of the chase

name: Road
description: Road - A Driving / Endless Runner type game in which you can Collect Coins, Magnets, Boosters, Overcome Obstacles such as Moving Plates, and Other Cars. All with Fun Music and Cool Visuals. The game also has Basic Settings and Score Saves.

name: No Worries
description: You find yourself in a mysterious island fight to stay alive against a monsters. Build, explore, survive in this relaxing first person survival game.

name: Resetail
description: In this 2D platformer you have to watch out for spikes, obstacles and enemies and make the right moves to find the key to the right door!

name: Moonshine Inc. + Ruinarch: Bad Habits Bundle
description: Become evil overlord or craft moonshine - Ruinarch + Moonshine Inc.

name: Beauties Unveiled: NoirPetal Level Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Beauties Unveiled
description: Sin descripción

name: Xanadu Land
description: Xanadu Land is a fast-paced massively multiplayer bullet hell game that brings you to the arcade gameplay. In the nonstop BOSS battle, your death is just the beginning，accumulate experience, acquire equipment, and fight side by side with other players to knockdown all the bosses!

name: Animal Race Party
description: In Animal Race Party, the main objective is to race through tracks, collecting gold stars to secure victory. Each player can choose from six cute animals, each possessing a unique skill that can be strategically used to gain an advantage.

name: An Unusual Cadence
description: Join Airia, a small town bard, as she summons all her courage to save the land in peril. Can you uncover the secret of The Legendary Instruments in time?

name: Super Algebrawl
description: Add up, multiply, clone, and divide your party members to beat the monsters on your path!

name: Ominous Tales: The Forsaken Isle - Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Humankind: Definitive Edition
description:
The Definitive Edition includes the base game and all previously released add-ons:

- HUMANKIND - Digital Deluxe Upgrade
Which Includes the Notre-Dame Wonder, Victor Hugo Avatar set and exclusive narrative events.

- HUMANKIND - Together We Rule Expansion Pack
Unite HUMANKIND with a new feature, a new currency and a new affinity all tied to Diplomacy! This pack also includes six new cultures, new wonders and narrative events.

- HUMANKIND - Cultures of Africa Pack
Expand your HUMANKIND experience with six new cultures, new wonders, narrative events and independent peoples.

- HUMANKIND - Cultures of Latin America Pack
Push HUMANKIND even further with six new cultures, new wonders, narrative events and independent peoples.

- HUMANKIND - Cultures of Oceania Pack
Set sail for new horizons with six new cultures, new wonders, narrative events and independent peoples.

- HUMANKIND - Para Bellum Wonders Pack
Fire up a whole new approach to conflicts with six new war-themed wonders.

name: Beach Boys 2: Zodiac Date
description: Discover the fascinating world of the zodiac signs as you embark on a journey to win the heart of the boy of your dreams.

name: Goo Fighter
description: Combine as many powers as you can to wipe out all the Goo around you! Sounds simple, right? Let's see if you can get past stage 16!

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Highway 35 Free Pack
description: Ballistik was born for pure speed, thanks to its aerodynamic line that cuts through the air creating a zero friction effect. Muscle Tone is driven by the desire for redemption and admiration, a force that pushes it to take on every race always at its best.

name: Matadouro: Grindhouse
description: A rogue detective infiltrates a cult compound to save a kidnapped woman and discovers a dark labyrinth of inhumane experiments and manmade flesh monsters. A tense and unnerving first-person survival horror game, with limited resources, exploration, and puzzle-solving.

name: Fairytale Theatre: Momotaro's Adventure
description: Momotaro's adventurous action game!

name: Fastest Finger First! 3 Hint Quiz
description:
Find the Common Link Among Three Clues!
A Fast-Paced Quiz Game Also Supporting Japanese & Korean

name: Downhill Driver: Extreme Racing Simulator
description: Xtreme downhill racing on dangerous tracks in powerful sports cars - set new records and take first place, racer!

name: Coloring Book Series: Aquarium
description:
The 3rd edition of the beloved "Coloring book series" takes you to the aquarium!
Let's dive into the coloring sea with sea life!

name: Hentai Girls: Office Romance
description: Meet over 30 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: LunLun Superherobabys DX
description:
From toddler to adults, anyone can enjoy this breezy action game!
Help Super Baby Lunlun escape after having been eaten by the giant & evil Boss Poo!

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Awakening - Scenario: Battle of Komaki-Nagakute
description: Sin descripción

name: Rescue! Dropkick on my Devil
description: Official casual anime game

name: Sushi Shot
description:
Aim your sushi and shoot!
Hit sushi of the same type to make them grow bigger and bigger!

name: Vigour
description: Vigour is a Puzzle Platformer game. This cute bird must solve puzzles with different mechanics in the levels. 30 differently designed levels, will you be able to pass all the puzzles? Complete the levels by solving different puzzles in each season.

name: Shalnor Legends Double Bundle
description: Two Story-Rich RPG/Action-Adventure games, made by one person over the span of many years.

name: Colorful Adventures Bundle
description: Explore a vibrant world of puzzles and magic with Colorful Adventures, featuring four enchanting indie games. Immerse yourself in this bundle for a magical experience!

name: Chess Grandmaster Royal Bundle
description: Boost your brain with four unique chess and puzzle games that will improve your mood, your problem-solving skills, your memory and your ability to concentrate.

name: Exiled
description: Charlotte is missing. Decode an ancient language, investigate a mystery, and stay away from ancient monsters in this compact puzzle thriller.

name: Arcade Archives: Super Contra
description:
ALERT! ALERT!
The aliens are back!

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: The Wings to Mars
description:
Version 7.2 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Fenghuang of Vicissitude (Fu Hua)
• New Story Chapter: The Star Which the Moon Gazes Upon (Part 2 Prologue)
• New Featured Event: Wild Phoenix Chase
• New Featured Event: Realms of Battle
• ...and more!

name: Ming Imperial Guards
description: "Ming Imperial Guards" is an adventure game based on the history of Ming Dynasty. You will incamate as Imperial Guards, explore various kinds of unsolved cases, cooperate to break up the conspiracies of the turbulent ruling and opposition parties.Your choice determines a different path from others!

name: Void Wars
description: Dodge, shoot and free the galaxy of the evil space mega corp. Use a variety of different weapons and spaceships, each with different playstyles to overcome many challenging levels.

name: Choc N Roll
description: It's time to get the ball rolling, but slow down! Be careful what you roll yourself into because too much chocolate can be harmful to you! Prepare to wind down and melt away as you enter the sweet world of Choc N Roll!

name: Mallion
description: Play the game from the perspective of a traveler who comes to the dealer and is faced with numerous choices in a story prepared by the dealer. Experience a story that changes based on your choices and see the ending that changes based on your choices!

name: Mortadelo y Filemón: Terror, Espanto y Pavor
description: Mort and Phil travel to the world of horror cinema in this adventure, thanks to Dr. Bacterio (of course!).

name: Satoyama Note: Natsukusa Komichi
description: "Satoyama Note: Natsukusa Komichi" is a novel game about the creatures that live in satoyama. Collect illustrated books and take the quiz-style satoyama test. The background music is played live by a shinobue flute, and the world is depicted by hand-drawn ink paintings.

name: Rocket Smash
description: Rocket Smash is a minimalist 2D physics and destruction arcade game. Navigate through countless arena levels, relentlessly smashing, bashing and crashing into enemy rockets to annihilate them. This game is all about precision, strategy, and the joy of destruction!

name: Floomy
description: Floomy is a challenging platformer with roguelite elements. The core essence of Floomy is obtaining mastery over tricky aerial maneuvers required to get from one platform to the other. While there aren't any checkpoints, each level is very short, and permanent upgrades make speedrunning a breeze.

name: Apex Heroines
description: Hack&Slash – Beat'em all! Six heroines, five types of weapons and adrenaline-pumping levels create an adrenaline rush you can't resist. Easy to learn and hard to master. 4K/120Hz & SteamDeck-ready. Everyone can enjoy the game!

name: Temple of Aeryn
description: In the mystical world of Temple of Aeryn, an enchanting adventure awaits you, filled with magic and mythical creatures. Tragedy strikes when a brutal assault on your village reduces your spell book to ashes, leaving you vulnerable to the encroaching darkness.

name: Multi Turret Academy
description: Multi Turret Academy is a top-down tank shooter game where you serve as the commander of various WWII tanks to participate in tank battles.

name: Chiyo
description: Chiyo is a first-person hardcore escape room horror game set in Japan's Edo era. As Idate Chiyo, a paranormal investigator possessing supernatural abilities, you are tasked with investigating an abandoned mansion and unveiling a family's dark history and it's ultimate secret.

name: Girls and Robots
description: This game is a survivors rougelike game.World is lost by monsters and bugs. Player can pick three diferent girls and robots, to make a special team.They will face thounds monsters and bugs, fight, live, evolution and find the trueth of the lost world.

name: Aquascapers
description: Bring Nature Home! Experience Aquascapers, a single-player and co-op aquascaping simulation that invites you and friends to discover and gather various ornamental resources for your aquascaping projects. Enhance your business and dominate the market!

name: The Pixel Pulps Collection
description: Influenced by 20th century pulp fiction and styled after 1980s home computer gaming graphics, Pixel Pulps transports you to strange and cryptic worlds not unlike our own... Explore the possibilities of interactive fiction in three unique stories, Mothmen 1966, Varney Lake, and Bahnsen Knights, all set within one eerie universe, and discover a fusion of exceptionally polished writing and strikingly unique visuals.

name: Monkey Math
description: Inspired by DK Jr. Math. A mathematical puzzle game to test your speed and knowledge of endless mathematical operations! Compete against your friends or compete against your personal best to improve your high score. There's monkey's, there's math, it's Monkey Math!

name: Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown
description:
Dash into a stylish and thrilling action-adventure platformer set in a mythological Persian world where the boundaries of time and space are yours to manipulate.
Play as Sargon and evolve from sword-wielding prodigy to extraordinary legend as you master acrobatic combat and unlock new Time Powers and unique super abilities.

name: Bulletstorm VR
description: Bulletstorm VR is a brutally creative action shooter that puts players in the ass-kicking boots of the hotheaded space mercenary Grayson Hunt as he shoots, kicks, and leashes all he can see across a hostile world in Virtual Reality!

name: Mystery Society 2: Hidden Puzzles
description: Dive into a hidden object adventure with unique tasks, puzzles, and a riveting story. Join elite detectives in a secret organization, uncover hidden treasures, and solve crimes across the globe.

name: A Thug's Ascension
description: A Thug's Ascension is a low-poly action-adventure / FPS story set in the dying city of Maratha, circa 2023. Become Chief, a feared mercenary, and experience a dark, slow-paced, character-driven crime drama marrying cinematic dialogue-driven storytelling with intense shooting and driving gameplay.

name: Holidays in Khrushchevsk
description: Do you like spontaneous purchases? Do all your purchases bring you happiness? Everything is not as simple as it seems at first glance.

name: Super Sean 007
description: Super Sean 007 is a platform game with a great world. The world consists of various beautiful sceneries of nature: forests, caves, mountains, and abandoned ruins telling the stories of when there used to be a civilization there.

name: Retropolis 2: Never Say Goodbye
description: The critically acclaimed VR adventure series is back! Get lost in a sci-fi mystery spanning over four all-new episodes. Engage a battle of the minds with a sick new villain and use only your wit, your hovering inventory, and a pair of extendo-arms to uncover the truth.

name: Twinkle Hunter
description: Twinkle Hunter is a 2D action game focused on boss battles. Become a hunter whose teddy bear was stolen by the great villain 'Twinkle Theives', and experience journey to retrieve the teddy bear. Can you hunt the thieves who attack you in various ways and rescue the teddy bear 'Mari'?

name: Three Kingdoms Zhao Yun
description: At the end of the Eastern Han Dynasty, the heroes were fighting for hegemony, and the flames were everywhere. In the game, players played the role of Zhao Yun and Zhao Zilong, a well-known general of the Three Kingdoms, and interpreted the story of Zhao Yun's youth.

name: New Cycle
description: Build a new civilization out of the chaos of an apocalyptic solar flare as you grow your House from a lone shelter to an industrial metropolis. Take on the burden of preserving life itself and help your people realize their aim: "A future beyond survival." Lead the world of New Cycle.

name: Turnip Boy Robs a Bank
description: Turnip Boy is back! This time he’s teaming up with the fearsome Pickled Gang to plan and execute the weirdest heist of all time. Shake down hostages, steal precious valuables, battle the fuzz, and use wacky tools bought off the dark web to move further into the vaults of the Botanical Bank.

name: Belonging
description: Belonging is a game about a cult and its victims. As a thief scouting a potential location they want to steal from, the player searches an abandoned estate of a cult to find valuables and uncover uncomfortable truths about what happened to the people that lived there.

name: Go Go Muffin
description: Go Go Muffin is an idle RPG where players can get rewarded anytime and anywhere! Adventurers are invited to be on board to start a fantastic adventure with Muffin -- the most perfect, unique, and cute pal from Midgard.

name: Aground Zero
description: The world has ended. You are deep underground, and all alone other than your AI companion. You will have to mine and build to survive, and search for other survivors to help you. Will you be able to reach the surface? And what will you see when you get there?

name: Fantome
description: Fantôme is a multiplayer (5 vs 1) psychological - horror game where you play with friends to Escape or as a Grifter, betray your friends and offer them as a sacrifice, to win.

name: Crumbling
description: Who says you’re too old to play with toys? Crumbling is a VR roguelike where you control your character with one hand, just like playing with an action figure! Battle against an onslaught of plastic monsters in thrilling hack’n’slash combat in a romping adventure that’ll take you right back to your childhood.

name: The Pony Factory
description: An old school First person shooter from the creator of DUSK, Fingerbones, and The Moon Sliver. Winston thought he could use hell energy to create magical ponies. Winston was wrong.

name: Plants vs. Zombies 3: Welcome to Zomburbia
description:
Plants vs Zombies is back in an all-new adventure that will test your zombie defense skills! Filled with plants and zombies new and old with the PvZ combat you’ve come to know and love. It’s the wildest PvZ yet that will have you rebuilding Neighborville while fighting against the wackiest zombies to date.

Dr. Zomboss has returned and transformed Neighborville into a zombie paradise! Embark on an epic adventure with Dave and his team of heroes in a story that’s crazier than ever before as they journey through the fog to free other citizens. Battle the zombie horde and fight off Dr. Zomboss to save and rebuild Neighborville your way!

The most outlandish zombie defense games are back in action in PvZ 3. Your real time strategy and puzzle solving skills will be put to the ultimate test in new challenges as you fight back brain-eating zombies. Take charge of your quirky cast of characters to drive out the zombie invasion that aims to take over. Zombie survival games meet fun tower defense action and match 3 inspired customization in Plants vs Zombies 3: Welcome to Zomburbia!

Will plants save the humans or will zombies claim them? Will Dr. Zomboss finally meet his match against Dave and his heroes? Find out when you join the fight and download Plants vs Zombies 3: Welcome to Zomburbia today!

name: Rising Lords
description: Rising Lords is a medieval turn-based strategy game with card and board game elements. Send your serfs to fight and die in your name... or let them prosper, and use them to your advantage!

name: Chalo Chalo
description: Really slow racing for 3 to 8 players.

name: Blood & Company
description:
Blood & Company is a work of interactive fiction with multiple endings, and about 3,000 total words in total, written for The Queer Vampire IF Jam.

"Your name is Zach. You’re 23, you were an art major in the two years of college you completed, oh, and you’re a vampire."

Play as Zach, who has survived his blood-sucking life so far by keeping to himself, never getting attached to the people he relies on for sustenance. Tonight, though, he's starting to feel a connection with the chatty grad student he plans to bite...

name: Oreo Pac-Man
description: Oreo Pac-Man is a promotional web browser game made in collaboration between Oreo and Bandai Namco. The game was made to promote Pac-Man themed Oreo cooked and the Oreo Pac-Man contest, in which the participants have a chance to win a trip to Japan or an Arcade1UP arcade machine, with European regions also having the additional prize of a mini LCD arcade game for the promotion. Current it has only been released within Europe, Australia and New Zealand.

name: Mischief Castle
description: Sin descripción

name: Delicious: Mansion Mystery
description: Emily & Francois investigate the poisoning of a high-society party host

name: JimmyQuest
description:
It is a morning unlike any other, for today Hajime "Jimmy" Lara is going to do something she has never(?) done before — take a big CHOMP out of Junta's tail!

Hajime "Jimmy" Lara and Junta are two beautiful cats who live together in a little house with two weird humans. But who cares about humans? Jimmy has her eyes on one target, and it's that enticing, twitchy, wriggly-wiggly tail sprouting out of Junta's butt.

The story will involve a brief introduction to Ms. Jimmy and Mr. Junta before she spends her hours honing her skills to pull off the perfect crime.

Bolster her STEALTH, ROUMB, CUTE, and BITE stats to ensure that she achieves her almighty goal!

And if you win...long live Queen Jim!

name: Soul Strike
description:
Easy Peasy Monster Squishy! Hack and slash like there’s no tomorrow! Soul Strike - Idle RPG is the perfect action idle game that you have been looking for!

Slay and strike vampires, titans, zombies, slimes, and dragons to continue your legendary adventure and battle your way to be the number 1 legend of this fantasy war!
Step into a free online idle RPG game and experience stress-free gameplay.

Discover why Soul Strike stands out as a top rogue-like idle action RPG game in today’s gaming landscape.

name: Educational Enamours
description: Educational Enamours is visual novel for adult only, young student Connor balances a new love, a mysterious teacher, and an old attraction, a childhood friend. Love, intrigue - your choice.

name: Donkey Kong Pac-Man Crossover
description: In this romhack Donkey Kong kidnaps Pauline again but gets help from the four Pac-Man ghosts Blinky, Pinky, Inky and Clyde. Jumpman and Pac-Man must join forces to save Pauline. Each board contains a number of pellets that must all be picked up before the board can be finished. You start each board playing as Jumpman, but you can temporarily transform to Pac-Man by picking up a power pellet. When you play as Pac-Man you are invincible and can chase and catch the ghosts. Make the Jumpman/Pac-Man team a success and save Pauline, but ... don't forget to pick up all pellets !!!

name: Call of Duty Endowment: Direct Action Pack
description: Support U.S. and U.K. military veterans by purchasing the Call of Duty Endowment (C.O.D.E.) Direct Action Pack Pack for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III and Call of Duty: Warzone.

name: Hentai: Royal Quarters
description: Embark on a steamy journey filled with adorable royalties in this hentai-inspired jigsaw game! Dive into the world of Hentai: Royal Quarters, where you'll be captivated by the irresistible charm of plenty of royal girls to get you off!

name: Chapter Wars: Expansion Pack
description: Chapter Wars Expansion Pack introduces new battlegrounds - Factory and Rural Terrain. Face zombie hordes, screeching mutants, and engage in Battle Royale. Plant the Bomb for swift operations. Unleash the new Flamethrower weapon. The fight for territory intensifies!

name: Forza Motorsport: 2019 McLaren Senna GTR
description: Forza Motorsport 2019 McLaren Senna GTR

name: Holdfast: Nations At War - Napoleon's Rise
description: Explore Napoleon's rise to power in Holdfast through this cosmetic content dedicated to the Emperor himself.

name: Creature Summon: Showdown Moment
description: A creative first-person card game that simulates VR perspective and controls. 3D spatial UI allows players to throw cards to any location based on their hand speed using the mouse.

name: Projeto Real: Treasure Map
description: With the treasure map, you'll finally be able to find all the resources!

name: Exoprimal: Exoprimal Survival Pass Season 3 - Premium Tier
description: These special rewards let you get more out of the wargame!

name: Shadow
description: Sin descripción

name: Ninja Maker
description: Ninja Maker is a 3D platformer game that you can create your own levels. Unleash your creativity and design the levels of your dreams!

name: The Sims 4: Goth Galore Kit
description: Embody the darkness with new goth styles from The Sims 4 Goth Galore Kit.

name: The Sims 4: Castle Estate Kit
description: Capture the classic grandeur of a castle with The Sims 4 Castle Estate Kit.

name: Tingus Goose
description: Tingus Goose Game Gameplay Grow your own goose tree. by Game Veterans on iOS / Android Grow your very own goose tree in this strange and bizarre game. Once these special geese find human hosts, they will be ready to grow into wacky goose trees. Water them, feed them, upgrade them and interact with them

name: Young Valkyries 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Bitty Knight
description: A fast-paced, challenging 2D top-down mini-roguelike with random levels and 30+ powerups. No two plays are ever the same and completely free-to-play. Avoid the many perils, collect copious loot and slay the final boss to escape the mini dungeon in Bitty Knight...

name: Konjiki no Gash Bell!!: Friends of Eternal Bonds
description: A gacha RPG mobile game based around the Konjiki No Gash Bell/Zatch Bell anime.

name: 77th: The Game
description: 77th: The Game is an abstract representation of the experience of joining an online community. Walk through the community and solve the puzzles to progress as a community member.

name: 9000 Years Ago
description: What would you do if you went back to a time when the land didn't belong to anyone?

name: 24 o 'clock
description: It has been impossible to study when it began, but it is gradually accepted by more and more people with its unique mathematical charm and rich connotation. This kind of game is simple and easy to learn, can strengthen the brain puzzle, is a very beneficial activity.

name: AEW: Rise to the Top
description: Idle game where you run the promotion and collect wrestlers to fight in matches.

name: Twizzle Puzzle: Reptiles
description: Twizzle Puzzle: Reptiles - is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime.

name: What's Up There?
description: A simple journey but which requires enormous concentration. Will you be able to reach the Light above or will you stay forever below? Fake and true game endings for the most curious players.

name: Cat Warrior
description: Cat Warrior is an action-platformer of retro and cute style about a cat knight on his way to recapture his stolen treasure. Deep into the dangerous fantasy world,defeat the challenging big boss with your slash, dash, jump, walljump and other skills to find the treasure back!

name: Trupki
description: The tiniest slide and connect puzzle game.

name: Yuuna and the Haunted Hot Springs: The Thrilling Steamy Maze Kiwami
description: Want to dive into a bath? Or into a dungeon? "Yuuna and the Haunted Hot Springs" is now an RPG that's pushing all sorts of boundaries! Power up in the hot spring, then push through clothes-ripping dangers to clear out the dungeon! A new story of hauntings, hot springs, and high adventure awaits!

name: Next Floor
description: Next Floor is a score attack, fast-paced, difficult, gory fps, with a simple objective, reach the highest floor you can. Take all your stress out on enemies and make the most creative kills to get as many points as possible, however, higher the floor, more difficult it will be. How far can you go?

name: The Lab and Dungeons
description: The Lab and Dungeons is a fusion of roguelike action and shooter RPG. As a robot, mine ores, craft unique weapons, and conquer procedural dungeons. Collect materials to unlock more advanced weapons. From a novice to a high-spec warrior robot, enjoy physics-based combat solo or in co-op mode online!

name: No Case Should Remain Unsolved
description: Twelve years after Senior Inspector Jeon Gyeong's retirement, she is visited by a young police officer: a woman who pleads with her to reexamine Seowon's case. But with each uncovered memory, only one thing becomes clear: everyone in Seowon's vicinity was lying.

name: Nephenthesys
description: Blast off on a treacherous mission to recover an unidentified energy source amidst an alien onslaught! Nephenthesys is a vertical scrolling shoot’em up presented in widescreen top-down 3D style.

name: House of Jigsaw: Urban Lifestyle
description: Experience the pulse-pounding thrill of city life with House of Jigsaw: Urban Lifestyle DLC.

name: Renovation Plan
description: This is a relaxing and leisurely home decoration game, you need to follow the design map to put all kinds of furniture in the corresponding position. Each room has unique furniture and decoration style, more gorgeous large apartment waiting for you to decorate.

name: Just Click the Button
description: In "Just Click The Button," you do indeed, click on a button. The more you click, the more the game evolves. Select new abilities that align with your playstyle. Decide whether to attempt to beat the game after reaching a certain threshold or play indefinitely!

name: Dominions 6: Rise of the Pantokrator
description: In Dominions 6 you take control of a powerful being that rules a nation and aspires to godhood. The type of Pretender Gods can vary from magically powerful arch mages to old dragons or an enormous tree. Dominions is a deep 4x turn based strategy game with a very large variety of spells and units.

name: All Quiet in the Trenches
description: All Quiet in the Trenches is a narrative turn-based strategy game set in the Great War. Get to know your soldiers, take care of their needs and lead them in battle, trying to strike a precarious balance between the ambitions of your superiors and the survival of your men.

name: Little Elf Tanks
description: A bombastic bug busting adventure! Play as one of four playable characters in their quest to to free their fellow elves from the clutches of an evil army of spiders. If they crawl, blast em all! Let nothing stand in your way.

name: Frontline Survivors
description: Frontline Survivors is an intense top-down shooter that puts you in the boots of a soldier fighting for survival on the battlefield. With countless enemies coming at you from all sides, you'll need to use all your skills and strategy to stay alive.

name: First Cut: Samurai Duel
description: Every strike is lethal in this blood-soaked sword fighting game. Slash, clash, parry, dodge and watch limbs fly. Choose your move carefully - the first cut is also the last.

name: Distant Sun
description: A sci-fi game based on character dialogue and choices. Uncover the mysteries of Pioneer Station by attempting diplomacy and seeking peace or gunning through those that stand against you. The decisions you make will have an impact on the ending.

name: Tedram
description: In Tedram you can drive a car or two trucks and choose your profession, your free to do what you want, driving the car or picking up trash in the city or even deliver some pizzas. The main goal for a player in this phase of creation its to make more money as possible.

name: Atlas Wept
description: A Humanist retro-style RPG game about sincerity and empathy, featuring friendly robot dogs and evil smiley faces.

name: Immortal Life
description: Immortal Life is a beautiful single-player management game where you play as a member of a cultivation sect. Fleeing the destruction of your community, you discover a breathtaking valley where a young community welcomes you with open arms. You set yourself to work relentlessly, decided to help your new brothers and sisters make this settlement grow and flourish into a prosperous village.

name: Star Wars Episode I: The Phantom Menace
description: Sin descripción

name: Top Heroes: Kingdom Saga
description:
On this distant and mysterious continent, countless unknown miracles and challenges are hidden. Here live magical creatures of various forms, each with their unique culture and profound secrets. Their legends and stories, filled with magic and myth, ignite the curiosity of every adventurer.

However, a powerful and terrifying dark force is spreading and threatening the peace and tranquility of this continent. Facing this dark tide, brave warriors from different races and cultures have stepped forward. They vow to unite and resist this evil force together.

In this passionate and adventurous game, you will play as a brave leader, leading these warriors through mysterious forests, ancient ruins, and dark caves to explore every corner of this continent. On the journey, you will encounter various wonderful creatures, uncover forgotten ancient secrets, discover hidden treasures, and fight against various powerful enemies.

Your wisdom, courage, and strategy will be the key to defeating the dark forces and protecting the peace of the continent. Rally your team, select appropriate equipment and spells, and fight for the future of this continent! In this grand adventure, every choice and battle is of great significance. Now, it's time to embark on this journey to save the world!

name: Someone to Hold Me
description: A very short, simple visual novel made in a week, starring an asexual girl and her internal and social tribulations. Featuring one ending, an unlockable epilogue, and a few post-game secrets.

name: Room231
description: Room231 is a single player horror game, which is based on the famous creepy pasta called "Backrooms". Player must find an exit to leave room231 and reach the truth of room231.

name: FashionVerse
description:
FASHIONVERSE: YOUR GAME. YOUR STYLE
Step into the shoes of a talented stylist in FashionVerse: Fashion Your Way. Create and style your own fashion to become a trendsetter. Dress your avatar in trendy outfits; design your dream closet with unique clothing; create your own designs and submit them to compete against other players in glamorous competitions; pick up challenges, and vote on different designs. Earn rewards for your fashion style and makeovers! FashionVerse: Fashion Your Way is an inclusive social styling game with AI-enhanced 3D visuals that create photorealistic results that allow you to create stunning looks. Fashion in your own way, design backgrounds, shop for great virtual looks, and get recognized for your stylish makeovers with incredible in-game rewards!

name: Paper Pilot
description: Guide your paper plane through challenging, twisty courses.

name: Psychopath Hunt Two
description: A butcher has captured you and taken you to his house.

name: A Haunted House
description: A Haunted House is a game inspired by classic survival horror. You play as paranormal investigator Eerie Grey who has been summoned to a remote house under suspicious circumstances.

name: Rock Life: The Rock Simulator - Rock Pack #2
description: Unlock more of the most rocks of rocks... in this Rock Pack! Known as the more special rocks in Rock Life: The Rock Simulator. You can use these special rocks in both the Multiplayer mode, "Rock Together", and in the Singleplayer mode, "Become Rock".

name: Train Sim World 4: Berninalinie - Tirano: Ospizio Bernina Route
description: Adventure to the Alps and drive famed RhB services as you climb, descend and weave your way through the cross-border peaks of Switzerland and Italy. You are invited into the stunning landscape of Europe, with Berninalinie for Train Sim World 4!

name: Portal 2: Confinement
description: Confinement is a Portal 2 mod featuring 28 challenging co-op puzzles based around the confinement mechanic.

name: Friends vs. Friends: Nerdvana
description: Nerdvana Comics is open on Buddy's Boulevard, and alongside everything that you need for your tabletop RPG nights you'll find new quests, cards, and cosmetics for Duck, DJ Newton, and Haru!

name: Gay Sex Adventures: Episode 3
description: An erotic Visual Novel featuring realistic-looking characters. Tony rediscovers life as a single man. Episode 3 brings him to the local gym where he meets Jacob - a hot Personal Trainer who offers Tony much more than what he’s paying for. Will Tony give in to his new trainer’s advances?

name: The Glitch Prison
description: Use the glitch you have discovered to break out of jail!

name: Hexagoner
description: Assemble your adorable team of battlers, navigate the unique hexagonal grid, and outsmart opponents in thrilling battles. Command a colorful cast of whimsical game pieces with special abilities. Manage resources wisely, adapt your strategies, and seize victory.

name: Cutlass Call
description: A starving pirate crew on a lone ship pins their hopes on the least experienced sailor, sending them ashore to an undiscovered island. Tasked with discovering 31 diverse foods, the rookie navigates the challenges of the island's terrain.

name: The Lament of a Lifeless Star
description: As their feet lead them on a journey... They happen upon the secret of how this world was destroyed.

name: The Spiritless Shaman
description: Read through this visual novel that will soothe the loneliest of hearts.

name: Strange Survivors
description: Come and sweep slime! Live on, make tomorrow's dawn more dazzling! Strange Survivors is a survivor like game that continuously allows characters to enter dungeons and receive rewards from monsters to make them stronger and stronger. Even in dangerous situations, they can move forward bravely!

name: Fuel & Food Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Come To Dust
description: Takes place inside of a corrupted castle while you are being watched by an evil entity.

name: Cult of the Lamb: Sins of the Flesh
description:
Sins of the Flesh, the next free update for cute cult sim Cult of the Lamb, offers loyal Followers a slew of worldly pleasures...

In its biggest and most wicked content update yet, the Cult’s tendrils extend even further with a blasphemous beneficence of quests, features, improvements and a deliciously evil new resource that rewards those leaders prepared to yield to the Sins of the Flesh.

name: Sail Forth: Maelstrom
description: Dive headfirst into the heart of the storm with the Sail Forth Maelstrom expansion! A tempest has swept across the Deepblue, bringing forth colossal vortexes that promise unparalleled challenges and untold treasures. Are you ready to face the Maelstrom?

name: Dungeons 3: Nintendo Switch Complete Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Tropico 6: Nintendo Switch Starter Bundle
description:
Tropico 6 - Nintendo Switch Starter Bundle includes:
• Tropico 6 - Nintendo Switch Edition
• The Llama of Wall Street
• Spitter

The Tropico 6 - Nintendo Switch Edition includes an exclusive palace design, the captivating flamingo pond, something every dictator craves to impress his neighbouring states and a tourist costume for El Prez to enjoy those warm caribbean nights adequately.

name: Railway Empire: Nintendo Switch Starter Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Rally Cross
description: A port of Rally Cross, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: Cult of the Lamb: Sinful Pack
description:
Sin to your heart’s content with Cult of the Lamb: Sinful Pack. This pack is the perfect way to indulge for those who enjoy a gluttonous aesthetic befitting kings and queens. Vanity might be a sin, but there’s nothing wrong with that!

Cult of the Lamb: Sinful Pack includes:
5 brand new Follower forms: Hammerhead, Ladybug, Tiger, Llama, Sphynx
6 new Follower outfits
6 new base decorations
A sinful new Fleece for the Lamb!

name: Day of the Sandwich
description: Day of the Sandwich is a short graphic adventure in the visual style of Lucas Arts titles Day of the Tentacle and Sam & Max: Hit the Road. A very short and simple puzzle adventure where the player is required to make a sandwich.

name: False Dream
description:
You find yourself trapped in a dream. Capture anomalies, meaning locations or phenomena that deviate from reality, with a camera. By doing so, you might be able to return to reality.

There are two modes: Normal Mode and Nightmare Mode. In Normal Mode, an anomaly will always occur at each time. However, in Nightmare Mode, there are instances where no anomaly occurs. You will find themselves wondering whether there are no anomalies present or if they simply haven't been discovered yet. I recommend playing in Normal mode for the first game.

name: Slave Zero X: Episode Enyo
description: Episode Enyo is a six-level campaign that takes place before the events of Slave Zero X, played from the perspective of one of the game’s main antagonists. The elite assassin Enyo is armed to the teeth and on a warpath to take down her most formidable target yet: the Sovereign Khan.

name: Interaction Isn't Explicit.
description:
What counts as interaction in video games? This short study debates different aspects of game design, pros and cons, and why such questions are essential for the language of computer games.

Explore a visually stunning world accompanied by a simple but effective third-person shooter combat and magnificent music, composed by FRENCH 79.

name: Starlight Scouts
description: Pure physics-based rocket-powered fun. Solve puzzles, fly fast, crash hard. Become a Starlight Scout...

name: Za češtiny ve hrách!
description: It is a retro-pixel arcade game in which the player must transport his ships with ships with Czech flag to the island and the computer or the other player prevents him from doing so. There are sharks in the way, which the ships must avoid.

name: Is This Gay?
description: You ever wanted to play a game that try's and gaslights you into being gay? Well I tell you what buddy call me the FBI.

name: Clem: The First Attribute
description: CLeM: The First Attribute is a free prologue that offers the first loop of CLeM, a narrative-driven puzzle adventure game with a dark twist. Wake up in a world where puzzles intertwine with exploration, weaving a unique narrative rooted in alchemy.

name: Homebrew32
description: Drawn into your PC by a mysterious antivirus, control a 1-5 barrel tank. Navigate the motherboard, defeating boss viruses to unlock new zones. The 'UPGRADE MACHINE' grants enhancements every 1-10 seconds. Use points from previous runs to upgrade it and gain an edge.

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Khameleon Kameo
description:
Announced for the Mortal Kombat 1: Kombat Pack, Khameleon is returning as a Kameo Fighter and was previously playable in Mortal Kombat: Armageddon as an exclusive character for the Nintendo Wii version.

She was introduced to the series in the Nintendo 64 version of Mortal Kombat Trilogy as a secret character with the abilities of all female ninja characters in the game. A male version called Chameleon was officially introduced on the other platform versions of the game with most of the abilities of all male ninja characters.

name: Extreme Bike Racing
description: Extreme Bike Racing is ultimate 3D Bike Racing game for all age group. There are 3 stages with 3 challenges in every stage in which player has to face different hurdles and difficulties to complete that challenge.

name: Purgatory Salvation
description: Purgatory Salvation is a multiplayer horror game where one player takes on the role of the Keeper of The Purgatory (Killer), and the other players play as Survivors, trying to escape from Purgatory and avoid being caught and killed.

name: Sun Spear
description: When ancient darkness threatens to swallow the world whole, call upon the power of the light! Wield the Sun Spear against the creatures of the night as Bonnie, a steadfast warrior determined to save her village. Can you seal away horrors untold before night falls forever?

name: Panda Go
description: This is a turn-based puzzle board game where you need to cleverly navigate your character through guards and various obstacles to reach the endpoint! Additionally, you can use the level editor to create your own levels and share them with the community or download levels created by other players!

name: Halcyon Days
description: While exploring ancient ruins, Teflon accidentally releases a mysterious woman and her guardian from their cryosleep. When it's revealed that they are from a lost civilization that shaped the world as it is today, an adventure of treasure, betrayal and friendship begins.

name: Minecraft Education: Planet Earth III
description: BBC Studios and Minecraft Education are teaming up once again to reimagine Earth’s most intriguing corners (and creatures!) into an explorable, blocky format!

name: Landlords & Tax Evasion
description: Embark on a feudal adventure in Landlords & Tax Evasion! Build your empire, dodge taxes, and conquer your way to prosperity.

name: Toy Trains
description: Let’s play Toy Trains! A playful track-building VR game where you create your own small world and engage in a captivating storyline. It’s all about imagination, creative thinking, having fun and… trains!

name: Home Safety Hotline
description: Home Safety Hotline is an analog horror inspired telephone operator simulator where you answer incoming callers' questions about what's inside their home. Read through a vast catalog of common pests and household hazards, and do your best to become an expert in home safety. You will be held responsible for what happens.

name: Kingsvein
description: Explore and reclaim the infested castle-city of Kingsvein! Ride into its depths on your trusty wyvern, and lead your customizable party of Knights and Mystics in deep tactical combat.

name: Contain
description: Contain is a first-person cooperative tactical shooter with in-depth character and gun customization. Contain requires calculated teamwork, Practice your tactics and test your equipment before the mission.

name: Extreme Evolution: Drive to Divinity
description: Extreme Evolution is an expressive platformer adventure; movement is your power: transform, drive, run, split, tumble, and launch yourself. Discover new forms and evolve as you explore this organic underworld open world.

name: Chaos Sisters
description: Beat'em up of devils beating up heroes: Free demo available!

name: Ravendawn
description: Ravendawn is a free-to-play MMORPG that seeks to revive the nostalgic isometric art style, emphasizing depth of gameplay, community, and unique character design over superficial graphics. The game also stands out for its commitment to ethical monetization, offering a balanced and fair experience for all players. The game's goal is to provide an immersive and rewarding experience, aligning with the values and expectations of modern players.

name: UFO Robot Grendizer: The Feast of the Wolves - Princely Outfit
description: Climb aboard Grendizer the Legendary Robot and fight the forces of evil

name: Gas Station Simulator: Airstrip DLC
description: Sin descripción

name: Gas Station Simulator: Can Touch This DLC
description: Sin descripción

name: SM64EX Coop: Mega Man X
description: A mod for SM64EX Coop that adds Mega Man X.

name: Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising - Character Pass 1
description: Set Contents: 6 DLC characters to be released: Lucilius, 2B, Vane, Beatrix, ???, ???

name: Midnight Custody
description: Midnight Custody is a short found-footage-style game where you wander through an eerie parking garage. It's a freaky, immersive terror fest that'll keep you on the edge of your seat!

name: Forest Ranger Services: The Pilot
description: Forest Ranger Services: The Pilot is the first episode of a new horror game series based on real-life events about the investigation of missing hikers in the U.S. National Parks. Follow the story of a wannabe reporter who got a job as a ranger to investigate the disappearances!

name: CockHero: Battle Rookie
description: Delve into the immersive experience with your sugar mommy Peni, who is waiting for her boyfriend.

name: Dodecadone
description: A physics & logic puzzler about merging shapes and traits, similar to Suika games. A triangle might be bouncy, your septagon sick & coughing, or an ennenagon defying the laws of physics.

name: Real Estate Real Romance: San Francisco
description: Dive into "Real Estate Real Romance: San Francisco" ! Sell opulent properties, charm the elite , and balance love and success in this yuri dating sim and point-and-click adventure game. Will Emilia find career success and true love? It's your adventure to shape!

name: Hero Siege: Guardians of the Cosmos Skin
description: Guardians of the Cosmos skins for Pyromancer, Paladin and Amazon classes. Includes visual skins for skills.

name: Dakar Desert Rally: USA Tour
description: Explore a massive new open world with new landscapes inspired by iconic North American landmarks, from the Grand Canyon to the Nevada Desert and Yellowstone, in both Rally Raid competitions and Free Roam mode.

name: Dream Sketcher: Book of Silence
description: This DLC includes 1 new script Book of Silence, 1 new investigator "Hound" Leonie, and 30 new cards.

name: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire?: Space Conquest
description: Challenge yourself and your friends with this brand-new theme: Space conquest

name: Hentai Tales: Succubus Utopia
description: Legend has it that creatures like succubus exist in the world. They will sneak into the dreams of sleeping men late at night and have sex with the men in their dreams to obtain the nutrients they need. You are about to have an unforgettable relationship with these succubus. What will be here?

name: Jump, Froggy! Jump!
description: Embark on a frog's odyssey in "Jump, Froggy! Jump!" a challenging 3D platformer! In this enchanting world, you'll step into the webbed feet of a courageous frog on his journey to rescue the Princess Frog. Can you conquer the castle and rescue the Princess?

name: The Last of the Summer Tank
description: Drive the Tiger I to fight the Allied forces and defeat the evil boss.

name: Spellbound Hearts
description: "Spellbound Hearts" is a visual novel where Lycos, a trapped vampire, meets Zephyros, a wizard seeking his blood to save a village. Together, they journey through trust, redemption, and love.

name: Christmas: Dark Side
description: This Christmas story is not as usual. Yes, there is the Santa Claus, his reindeer and gifts for children. But these are not at all the gifts that a child expects for Christmas. And you can't even imagine what awaits you that night!

name: Bisyntho
description: Bisyntho is a casual physics-based arcade game about combining orbs. Use and abuse the few tools provided to you in order to last as long as possible and push your high score to its limit.

name: Naughty & Nice
description: PUSS XXXIV brings you 30 Doommas maps split evenly into two episodes."The Nice List" features more easy-going maps that heavily feature our cuddly bunny friends running amok as we slay demons. Perfect for those who want to enjoy a "chill" Christmas-themed wad. "The Naughty List" provides some intense maps that are generally more "cooked". If micro-slaughter, slaughter, lots of Cyberdemons and Archviles, and combat puzzles are your jam, this is the episode for you.

name: Hentai Golf: Lakeside Fairways
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Golf: River's Edge
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Golf: Prairie Greens
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Golf: Sunset Pines
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Golf: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Bugby
description: Sin descripción

name: Monke Island: Rise of the Beast
description: Monke Island: Rise of the Beast is a spiritual successor and parody of Skull Island: Rise of Kong. Iterating upon everything that made that game a masterpiece but with a new IP. This is the definitive Monke experience, leave humanity and become a giant Monke.

name: Toxic Tomb
description:
Toxic Tomb is an action platformer with the spirit of a SEGA Master System game.
Crawl along each level and destroy all the generators to force the opening of the reactor. Then attack the reactor to release the ghoul inside it and kill it. Move fast, chain enemy kills and get stars to obtain bonuses. You'll get an extra life every 75.000 points. Finding the right place to attack and dodge is the key. Also, playing gracefully from the beginning will help you in the final stretch of the game.

name: Manor Madness
description: In Manor Madness you take on the role of the ghost Ghustav and unleash mayhem. Ghustav has been accepted to the most prestigious school of Polter High where they will study how to possess objects and fling them across the room. Of course, traditional haunting can't be missed. Turn on any electrical appliances, flick the light switch, or play a spooky tune.

name: Toxic Bomb
description:
Toxic Tomb is an action platformer with the spirit of a SEGA Master System game.
Crawl along each level and destroy all the generators to force the opening of the reactor. Then attack the reactor to release the ghoul inside it and kill it. Move fast, chain enemy kills and get stars to obtain bonuses. You'll get an extra life every 75.000 points. Finding the right place to attack and dodge is the key. Also, playing gracefully from the beginning will help you in the final stretch of the game.

name: ByteBurst
description: Welcome to the cutting edge of virtual mayhem in "ByteBurst" - the ultimate hacker's playground. Immerse yourself in a thrilling journey through the digital realm, where your skills will be pushed to the limit, and every line of code is a potential weapon.

name: My Grandparent's House
description: My Grandparent's House is a first-person survival horror experience where you must play as a ten year old boy exploring a horrifying house and unraveling the mystery that lies within. Every game intends to be unique, as puzzle solutions, item placement and a part of the house are randomized. Unlock ten story-driven documents and six unique endings.

name: Family Ties
description: Discover the power within you, challenge the hardships of life, and keep your family together in this epic game called 'Family Ties.' Take on the challenging tasks that await you and seize control of your life. Stand strong in the face of life's sudden twists because there's a hero within you!

name: Apathy in Our Stars
description: Meet some aliens, make some money, and save the galaxy while you're at it!

name: Dool
description: Collide cubes on the same axis to destroy all cubes. Open paths for the cubes using various methods.

name: Michihaku Lucient 2: Itsuka, Kimi ga Otona ni Natte mo
description: Sin descripción

name: The Bard for Her
description: A visual novel, dating sim with map exploration. Play a womanizing bard with a lute and romance and build a relationship with five attractive women.

name: White Lilies Code
description: You’re an average electronic technician. You live in a big city. You’ve a lot of work. You’re tired so it’s high time to have a vacation. But… a chain of sudden events puts you in an incredible adventure.

name: Sakura Succubus 8
description: The eighth part of the Sakura Succubus series is finally here! Join Hiroki and his loyal harem as they try to help Alice overcome her greatest challenge yet: trying to find a job.

name: Heaven Studio
description: Heaven Studio is a tool to create playable Rhythm Heaven custom remixes, with many customization options.

name: Master Manager
description: You are the manager of a football club, determine its future by making the best decisions regarding tactics, training, player contracts, sponsorship deals and infrastructure. Watch your players performing on our amazing 2d match engine.

name: Sympathia
description: 『Dodge × Beat』 Enjoy the world of sympathia in rhythm!

name: Chromatic Isle
description: Discover the peaceful beauty of Chromatic Isle, a 30-minute getaway where music and puzzles unite in the four seasons. Whether you're a seasoned gamer or new to puzzles, this harmonious journey awaits. Unveil the secrets of each season in Chromatic Isle.

name: Shougakusei ha Maseteiru.
description: Sin descripción

name: Garlic Builder
description: Garlic Builder is a unique building game. As the new builder of the Garlic Family, can you inherit your father's building hammer, take various orders, follow the blueprint, or use your imagination to fulfill the strange needs of your customers?

name: Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown - Deluxe Edition
description:
Get the most out of your adventure with the Deluxe Edition, which includes a digital adventure guide and in-game content such as the Prosperity Bird amulet and the Immortal outfit for Sargon.

Pre-purchase to get an exclusive in-game Warrior Within outfit!

name: The Four Paths
description: The Four Paths is a game with a multilinear story and strategic battles where you will have new cards according to the paths you choose. Play as Roy and sacrifice everything in exchange for money. Play as William and atone for your sins with a brutal revenge.

name: Micegard
description: MiceGard is an adventure game where you will play as mouse-vikings. Immerse yourself in a unique world inspired by Scandinavian mythology.

name: Nudomatic
description: Nudomatic is a game in which you go around Megacity to photograph and undress the pretty girls who cross your path.

name: Drake's Dungeon
description: An adult, survival game where hunky men battle hordes of lusty monsters! The more monsters you kill, the more sticky, sweaty, muscle-packed story you'll unlock. Better start whackin'.

name: Love Challenge
description: You are a retired male whore with a villa on the hill. On this day, three beauties came out of nowhere to seek help. Taking advantage of the opportunity of the three beauties spending the night, use your expertise to make them willing to sleep with you without the other two beauties knowing.

name: War Shore
description: A tower defense game that will bring challenge and many hours of fun. Get ready for battle in this amazing naval-themed game.

name: Escape Space
description: A 2D horizontal shoot’em’up. Purchase various spaceships and weapons. Upgrade them. Customize your loadout. Accept contract missions and defend our solar system against intruders.

name: Time Survivors
description: The Most Historically Inaccurate Roguelike Ever Made. Slay hordes of minions as Lincoln, Tesla, Cleopatra and other historic heroes with new unique abilities! Fight through various historical eras, collect resources, unlock and enhance gameplay through our skill-tree metaprogression.

name: Path to Purge
description: "Path to purge" is a game with simple operation and exciting combat. The game integrates three-dimensional high-precision scene models, distinctive cartoon-rendered characters, and a skill selection system full of changes, providing a tense and exciting combat experience in just a few minutes.

name: The Last Medic
description: The Last Medic is a 2D precision platformer set in space. Earth was hit by an asteroid and you are the last surviving medic. Your space suit is equipped with a jetpack, a dash booster, and a healing device. Use these tools as you travel from planet to planet on your way to save Earth.

name: Sovereign Syndicate
description: Victorian steampunk RPG with tarot cards instead of dice. Investigate the disappearance of society’s most vulnerable to uncover a mysterious cult. Play as three characters, each with their own skills and motivations. Customize your characters with narrative choices to unlock new tarot cards.

name: Elvera
description: Welcome into the realm of ELVERA, an Indie Third-Person PvP Action Game passionately developed by a single developer.

name: House Builder
description: They say a man must do three things in his life: plant a tree, beget a son and build a house. We can’t help you out with the tree neither with the son, but you can build as many houses as you like while playing House Builder.

name: Dashing Dasher
description: Dash through the city in your Dashing outfit, get to your goal. Become the ultimate Dasher

name: 'Rift' Electric
description: 'RIFT' Electric is a first person puzzle game where you take a questionable job listing and must enter strange homes to turn off all the lights. Using a lens that reveals hidden objects and electrical connections, you must figure how the rooms are wired to escape safely.

name: Harbingers of Desspair
description:
You have died, and those aren't the pearly gates before you...
Your soul has traveled through a wormhole and ended up on the remains of a library on the remnants of a once thriving moon...you hear a mystical voice in your mind directing you to talk to a skeleton a short distance ahead...

After some 'training' the skeleton has you follow him to a magical rostrum where you can select a new body for your soul to inhabit...
You are presented with 32 different bodies and the ability to possess an instance of Desspair himself or one of his trusted Guild Officers before traveling back in time to try and help stop the wormhole from causing the devastation and your interesting predicament...

Embark on an epic adventure as you Explore, Quest, & Survive in the 1st batch of 14 wonderous zones...

With the setting of a Jupiter sized planet with 3 earth sized moons along with a couple pocket dimensions for good measure, good times & numerous memorable adventures are bound to be had...

name: Methods: Detective Competition
description:
Methods: Detective Competition is a mystery visual novel

The first chapter in the Methods Visual Novel series.

Methods is a visual novel with simple crime investigation gameplay where you examine evidence and answer multiple-choice questions about the solution.

And the whole game has been split into five apps for the mobile release, with 'Methods: Detective Competition' being the first, and containing Chapters 1-20.

name: Hotel Simulator 2024
description: Hotel Simulator 2024 is a game to build and run a hotel empire. Design a hotel, manage staff, satisfy diverse guests, and set winning strategies. This simulation game blends creativity, strategy, and management in an immersive hotelier journey

name: We Are Stardust
description: Space Invaders. Wrapped in a circle. And Mavis Beacon playing it.

name: The Gauntlet
description: In The Gauntlet, you'll need to move fast and control your every move. Various obstacles stand in your way, and it's up to you to find the best way to get through them, taking advantage of your moves and your unique weapon that lets you freeze objects in place.

name: Sea and Adventure
description: sea and Adventure is a game with platform jumping adventure and strategic sea battle gameplay as its core. It has some difficulty getting started, but it can really improve your abilities

name: Rinse and Repeat
description: Rinse And Repeat is a short retro-inspired (PS1/vhs) first-person horror game with multiple endings. It's inspired by childhood fears of closing your eyes in the shower.

name: Courtin' Cowboys
description: It's 1863 and you, the player, are traveling through the small western town of Summerfair. Meet up to 7 love interests and discover their deliciously dark pasts... as well as their current horrifying misdeeds.

name: Rhythm Soccer
description: Play with football teams from Brazil, Argentina, Italy, and Germany in an amazing rhythm game! Hit the notes to pass and shoot and win the tournament! With cartoonish visuals and 15 manually synchronized songs, have a lot of fun! Download now and experience the excitement of the rhythm of football!

name: The Inner Descent
description: "The Inner Descent" is a VR horror-adventure. Survive a haunting forest, explore eerie buildings, and evade lurking fears. Find keys to unlock your escape in this replayable journey. Will you conquer your inner self?

name: Soul Sader
description: You becomes the knight who notices the disaster that's coming. A knight who has decided that his own power cannot prevent it wants to gain the power of other knights. You can use the portal to get directly to where the knights are, but the other knights won't be obedient.

name: I am Lost
description: Oh, you know, just casually strolling through the job market, and bam! There it was – an advertisement so captivating, I couldn't resist its siren call. It promised a future so bright I'd need sunglasses, and the paycheck? Oh, honey, it was singing a sweet serenade to my bank account. Little did I know, they forgot to spill the beans on the whole shebang! The mystery unraveling is almost as exciting as a surprise birthday party...almost.

name: Captain Willie
description: Ahoy there! Welcome to Captain Willie's crew! Join us on a maritime adventure as his trusty deckhand. Your job? Tend to routine ship tasks—chop potatoes, stoke the furnace, and keep the deck shipshape.

name: Agent

The Carter family flee from their home country to an island that they inherited from their late family members to escape the horrors of World War One. They soon find out, however, that their family is being used for a much more sinister reason...

Project Astra Dominium is a Tower Defense game with Basebuilding and Automation elements.
Build up your base to become a supply hub for Earth's desperately needed materials, gather resources while defending against an unknown alien threat and improve your tower's and AI capabilities.

Easy To Learn Hard To Master!

Fight and defend through hordes of demons in this old-school fast-paced action game. Each floor starts with a defense phase where you defend yourself from hordes of creatures by buying and upgrading defensive equipment. Kill monsters to earn money. Loot chests to level up your equipment.

Undercraft combines an automatic combat system with a wide variety of cards and characters, where the player fights in unpredictable scenarios that evolve with each game.
Featuring a turn-based combat system, the player battles three opponents in a free-for-all match for first place. Rise through the leagues and unlock more than twenty heroes, play with more than one hundred classes and compete in matches that will always turn out different.

Sylvie miniature is a "seven game" — 7x7 tiles, 7x7 screens, 7x7 world.

A different take on the highly popular watermelon merging game.

A casual game where the goal is to merge different fruits to get the watermelon, it takes inspiration from the merge 3 puzzle game format and adds it's own twist.

With no timer to rush you, each move can be strategic, allowing for a more relaxed yet engaging gameplay experience.

Connect a line of same-colored squares from one side of the board to the other to clear the line and score! Be careful though; while the line can turn, it cannot branch or loop.

name: Car Racing Master: Car Game 3D
description:
Race Master 3D Car Racing is a furious, fast and fast racing game. If you love playing car racing games and are familiar with car driving games, try this car game and immerse yourself in the fun of car games in 3D. Play car racing games 3D for the car racing adventure. Enjoy an exciting experience of car driving simulator games with interesting gameplay and stunning graphics in this racing master game.

In this car racing master 3D racing game, this addition to car racing games can give you the feel of a real car simulator like no other racing game. The amazing fast driving experience on different racing tracks can provide a real car driving experience that is more engaging than other racing simulator games. This new car racing 3D game has different racing cars that you can drive at ultimate speed on multiple racing tracks that are comparable to the best car games.

No… show us with this pack of five new emotional emotes! Internet connection required to access downloadable content.

Universe bursting with flavors and culinary adventures awaits!

Your adventure begins with Food Truck Tycoon. Cook, chop, bake and enjoy hundreds of unique dishes.

As you hone your cooking skills and build your reputation with food trucks, you'll be given the opportunity to explore more gourmet games as DLC.

Customize your kitchen with countless upgrades and serve delicious food in different locations. Keep the grill hot, keep your customers smiling, sauté, mix and serve to the top.

Face cooking challenges to become the ultimate chef in town!

So put on your apron, sharpen your knives and enter the cooking arena. Life is a party - let's cook delicious!

This bundle contains "Cooking Arena", "Sweet Bakery Tycoon", "Food Truck Tycoon - Asian Cuisine" and "Burger Chef Tycoon".
