description: Set off on the most engaging golf adventure you have ever seen and visit breathtaking places from around the world.

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 - One Piece Film: Red Pack
description: Play as three new characters with this fifth character pack! Wield weapons as your favorite characters from the hit movie One Piece Film: Red and enjoy even more Pirate Warrior action!

name: Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!! - Undertale + Deltarune Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: For a Vast Future: Definitive Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Eggconsole Marchen Veil PC-8801mkIISR
description:
The tale of a prince transformed into an ugly monster and cast to the ends of the world. Overcoming numerous challenges, he must now return to the princess!
This action RPG was released by System Sacom in 1985.

This game is the first part of the "Märchen Veil" series. The story of the first part is until you meet Neptunus, the god of the sea.

name: The Dismal Silhouette
description: Single player map for Quake, using the Arcane Dimensions mod. Based on E2M6: The Dismal Oubliette, by John Romero.

name: Flash of the Blade X
description:
Flash of the Blade is a first-person slasher with a high level of difficulty due to its one-hit-kill mechanic. Described by testers as unforgiving, brutal, and thematically on-point, the game has gone through extensive balancing to get it to a stage where it is no longer unfair, but FUNfair.

The game is purposefully light on story, basing itself around a battle between a lone ninja and an Evil Ninja Clan helmed by a diaper-wearing Sumo. Expect to suffer not just due to the game's difficulty, but due to seeing the boss in a giant diaper.
The story effectively boils down to - See Ninja, Fight Ninja, Be Ninja.

Flash of the Blade contains 11 fast-paced, ferocious levels, 5 deadly weapons, and 6 grueling enemy types.

name: Arcade Archives: Cosmo Gang The Puzzle
description:
"COSMO GANG THE PUZZLE" is a puzzle action game released by Namco (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1992.
Make sure to line up the cosmos and containers that fall from above to eliminate them.
Containers disappear when lined up horizontally, and cosmos can disappear when hit by the blue ball.
The key to strategy is to rotate the parts well and create a good path for the ball.

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 - Koby's Combat Chronicle & Soul Map 2
description: Join the Marines' young hero, Koby, as he endures a journey of intensive special training!

name: Syllogism
description: Explore an open world full of beautiful views and locations, and enjoy a relaxing atmosphere while immersing yourself in unique challenges that will challenge your imagination and logical thinking.

name: Vampires and Afternoon Tea
description: Crossing Death and Achieving the End

name: Old World: Wonders and Dynasties
description: History is shaped by fountainheads of great dynasties that leave their mark on the world - forge the foundations of powerful empires and build legendary wonders that will stand the test of time.

name: Okekenuki
description: Okeke is shin hair to pull out. This game is to pull out about 5000 shin hairs on your shin. As you progress through the game, you can acquire new abilities and remove shin hairs more efficiently. Face the shin hairs, face yourself, and cleanse your shins to purify yourself.

name: Laser 77: Virtual Lab
description: Shoot, slash and dash your way against virtual enemies and try to max your score in this 2D, top-down action game.

name: Durak NTR: Doomed Romance Pack
description: More girls to break your heart.

name: Orienteering Simulator
description: Orienteering Simulator is a Singleplayer-Game that focusses on the same-named sport "Orienteering". Use a compass and a map to find your targets in a friendly 3D-Environment.

name: Sleigh Strikers
description: Santa's going high-tech with the Present Launcher 1225! Join the jolly ride, rescue reindeer, and blast presents down chimneys in this holly, jolly, fast paced shoot 'em up. Make every shot count and save Christmas in a dash!

name: Bondman of Traps
description: Bondman of Traps is a challenging survival obstacle course game. There is no limit to dying in this game. Solve the traps, improve your reflexes, and pass through them one by one. Traps will harm you and cause you to start over. Either you become a prisoner of traps or the master of traps...

name: Time Glitch
description: Embark on an epic bite-sized DnD-inspired journey in Time Glitch, where your knowledge of the past shapes the future.

name: Medieval Machines Builder: First Siege
description: Embark on a captivating journey back to the roots of medieval conflict with Medieval Machines Builder - First Siege. This free-to-play simulation game offers a taste of the grandeur and challenges that await in the full game. Design, build, and destroy. Medieval lethal weapons await you!

name: Lasers
description: Lasers is a multiplayer game where you must survive deadly laser mazes until only one player remains standing.

name: Cross Dungeon
description: Connect the tiles and conquer the dungeon. Monsters and treasure await! Defeat monsters and move on. Power up when you get the treasure. Let's proceed while collecting treasures.

name: Illegal Mahjong
description: Yuri, the former heiress of a company, finds her father's business bankrupt. To repay the debts, Yuri must compete in mahjong and continue to win. Can Yuri truly defeat her formidable opponents?

name: The Unknown Fear
description: The Unknown Fear is about a prisoner, sentenced to death, that had his memory deleted. His only chance of changing his life is by retrieving a file on the main computer of a secret settlement. Will you be able to get a new life or will the imprisoned creature in the settlement devour your body?

name: Basketball Grand Slam 2024
description: "Basketball Grand Slam 2024" is a real-time basketball competitive game. The game uses real-time synchronization technology to ensure fair competition among players. Smooth operation, smooth touch, and real dynamic capture system create a 3D basketball world. Welcome to your Basketball world!

name: Slayin DX
description: Run through wave after wave of monsters with your weapons, spells or mounts in this endless single screen arcade game.

name: Twistex
description: Twistex is a falling block puzzle game with a 'twist'. Made especially for VR, it combines classic gameplay with original new mechanics. 2 game types, 2 modes, 48 levels, unlockables and customization.

name: Package Runner
description: Your number is 22, a Package handler at Zenith Company. Your job is to fix those packages and keep your workspace tidy. Hot bath service is the only reward in this damn job. With work going on, you'll find the truth of the company.

name: Monday Meltdown
description: Unleash your inner Monday rage in "Monday Meltdown," a 2D multiplayer mayhem. Engage in intense battles across casual environments like the office, gym, and grocery store. With a vast arsenal of weapons, be the first to achieve 10 kills for victory. Let off some steam and conquer Monday madness!

name: VRosty
description: Pull-along VRosty, the little snowman, through a warming world in this VR-only puppet-puzzle-platformer. His life is hanging by a thread.

name: Unstoppable
description: The first series of ‘Unstoppable' is a mystery survival game that takes place in the ‘Everway Investment' conducting secret research. Find an antidote, avoid the infected, and uncover hidden stories. Are you ready to escape?

name: Time Handlers
description: Time Handlers is a cooperative puzzle game where you play as 2 employees of the Time Company tasked to repair the spatio-temporal rifts caused by a mysterious tower. Face baffling and exciting challenges to progress through the various levels of the rift that threatens time.

name: The Last Veggies
description: The Last Veggies is a 2d top-down shooter roguelite where you play as a farmer or his friends fighting hordes of monsters while trying to save humanity by delivering fresh veggies. Play different maps with different characters and an always changing set of Items and Upgrades.

name: Cryptis
description:
Reawakened In Desolation...

Awaken amidst a desolate realm, your last memory being a life far removed from this nightmare. Embark on a journey of relentless violence, navigating through hordes of bloodthirsty undead. What sinister force has brought you to this place? Plunge into a tale shrouded in shadows and unveil the chilling truth.
Next-Gen Visuals Meet a Retro Aesthetic
Built in the mesmerizing Unreal Engine 5 and harnessing the cutting-edge capabilities of Nanite and Lumen, Cryptis immerses you in a haunting world where retro-inspired designs meet breathtakingly realistic lighting.
Dynamic and Diverse Gameplay
No two encounters are the same. Your journey will see you wielding an array of weapons, tools, and abilities that allow for varied approaches to confrontations, ensuring a fresh and thrilling experience with every battle.

Embrace the chaos, slaughter your bloodthirsty adversaries, and overcome the darkness. The very fabric of this realm quivers at your presence. Leave nothing left standing.

Welcome to Cryptis. Your nightmare has just begun...

name: Story in the Dream World 3: Sinister Island's Mysterious Mist
description: This Game is 'Story in the dream World Series' 3rd story -Sinister Island's Mysterious Mist-! It is a Game in which the main characters are active with help in order to stop the fog in an island, the source of it, after hearing signs or stories of unknown poison fog coming from various gods before!

name: Skies Above the Great War
description: Skies Above the Great War is a hybrid of action and grand strategy sandbox game set on the Western Front during the First World War. Manage your air forces or take control of any plane yourself in real time.

name: Terranny
description: Design and program drones, then send them into battle.

name: Metal Ascension
description: Metal Ascension is a horde survival game with rogue-lite elements. Upgrade your mech with over 200 pieces and more than 1 000 000 combinations.

name: Unnatural: Benighted
description: Two demon hunters investigate the disappearance of people and encounter unexplained phenomena.

name: Buzz
description: Buzz is a challenging momentum-based platformer.

name: Benighted
description: John Hope will have to find his wife, abducted by unknown creatures after a traffic accident. And survive at any cost...

name: Momodora: Moonlit Farewell
description: Join Momo, High Priestess of the village of Koho, as she embarks on a divine mission to save her people from imminent destruction at the hands of the demon hordes summoned by a malevolent bellringer.

name: War Hospital
description: Be the ray of hope among the darkness of war. Control a British WW1 field hospital in a unique society survival game. Fight for life, soul, and humanity in a world that rejected them.

name: Funko Fusion: Team Fortress 2 Pack
description:
Meet the Team Fortress 2 Pack!

Packing more punch than the sandvich, this FREE all-action add on is kind of a big deal! Relive some of your favourite Team Fortress 2 moments in Funko Fusion with these characters:

- The Scout
- The Heavy
- The Engineer
- The Medic

name: Telomeria
description: A short, horror themed point-and-click adventure set in an empty, dreamlike pre-rendered world.

name: Royal Card Clash
description: Defeat the royals in this solitary card game! This game is a total reimagining of classic card games like Solitaire, with just you and a deck of playing cards. You will have to think carefully and play your cards right to achieve victory.

name: Isoland4: The Anchor of Memory
description: ISOLAND4 is the fifth installment in the ISOLAND series by CottonGame. The game continues to feature the distinctive hand-drawn style of CottonGame, with point-and-click gameplay. The game also features a second playthrough mode, which allows players to gain a deeper understanding of the game.

name: The Lord of Hexa
description: You are a medieval Lord who must construct a colony, complete challenges to expand the kingdom, and rule an hexagonal low poly world. Immerse yourself in a tranquil ambiance with soothing sounds and music in this minimalistic tile game!

name: Total Control
description: Total Control is a text based NSFW god complex game. In this game you will have supernatural powers combined with RPG elements that will give you Total Control over the world.

name: Forza Motorsport: 1983 Porsche #11 John Fitzpatrick Racing 956
description: Forza Motorsport 1983 Porsche #11 John Fitzpatrick Racing 956

name: Idle Champions: Xalimnos the Xorn Familiar Pack
description: In this pack: Xalimnos the Xorn Familiar 4 Epic Potions of Speed 4 Epic Potions of Giant's Strength 4 Epic Potions of Clairvoyance 1 Potion of Polish

name: Idle Champions: Mind Flayer Karlach Theme Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Karlach (if you don't already have them) Mind Flayer Karlach Skin An Exclusive Familiar An Epic Feat for Karlach 1 Epic Potion of the Gem Hunter 16 Gold Karlach Chests with 2 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Cards

name: Idle Champions: Feywild Fen Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Fen (if you don't already own them) Feywild Fen Skin An Epic Feat for Fen 7 Gold Fen Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Rogue Galleon and the Haunted Treasure
description: Rally your band of rogues to battle the spooky monsters haunting the Pirate's galleon! In this top-down shooter + rogue-lite game, power up with temporary upgrades, then spend gold on permanent power once you fall in battle.

name: Backrooms: Realm of Shadows - Full Version
description: Embark on a thrilling odyssey through the Backrooms: Realm of Shadows and discover what lies beyond the veil of reality. Are you prepared to face the shadows and unravel the mysteries that await in this dark and unforgiving realm? The adventure begins now - if you dare.

name: Frostrain
description: Be the last train conductor roaming the postapocalyptic frozen world! Expand, strengthen, and build synergies on your train. The promised land beyond the toxic zone awaits you and your passengers.

name: All Elite Wrestling: Fight Forever - The Storm is Coming!
description: The legendary women's wrestling champion from down under Toni Storm joins the Fight Forever playable wrestler roster along with 10 new tracks.

name: Cynthia: Hidden in the Moonshadow - Complete Edition
description: Emotional, 3rd-person, story-driven, adventure game focused on solving puzzles and using stealth mechanics. Use your bow to interact with environmental elements. Sneak, climb or distract guards to move further unnoticed. Solve light puzzles alongside your path to rescue your loved one.

name: Fuga: Melodies of Steel 2 - Ultimate Edition
description: The sequel to the captivating tale of Fuga: Melodies of Steel has arrived! This turn-based RPG is back with a ramped up battle system for more strategy, as well as a brand new event system that gives you more thrilling choices to affect your experience!

name: Fuga: Melodies of Steel - Ultimate Edition
description:
"We have to fight! If we don't, everyone we love will be taken away!"

One fateful night, a peaceful village is thrown into the flames of war. Determined to save their families, a group of children boards a giant tank and begins an offensive charge!

Fuga: Melodies of Steel is an RPG where you place children, each with their own unique characteristics and skills, at different gun turrets in a tank to fight against the enemy.

Living inside the tank, the children show emotion and gain affinity amongst each other. Manage these both to change the outcome of their journey!

name: Kawã na Terra dos Indígenas Maraguá
description: Kawã na Terra dos Indígenas Maraguá is an educational platformer developed by the Federal University of São Carlos, under its LEETRA laboratory. It tells the story of a young indigenous boy who goes through the Wakaripé ritual. According to the tradition that marks the transition from childhood to adulthood, when boys turn ten, they must pass some tests to demonstrate their bravery. Then, at the age of 15, they face the even more challenging Gualipãg ritual, which entitles them to become "chief hunter-warrior".

name: Info Player Start: A Dope (Challenge) Map
description: A quick map made by spootnik with some small challenges.

name: Nothing
description: A game about doing Nothing

name: Astral Abstraction
description: Astral Abstraction is an atmospheric 5 episode total conversion that aims to advance the formula of Doom's gameplay, bringing it more in line with the modern entries in the series. The vertical aspect of gameplay is expanded and more fleshed out, and the pace of gameplay is faster. ﻿

name: Trash Top Down Racing
description: Top down 2d racing game. Race against AI opponents in different racing tracks

name: Underminer
description: Welcome to Underminer, an underground adventure game set in a subterranean world. Mine minerals, earn money, upgrade your drill machine and descend deeper into the earth. The truth about 'legendary minerals' and an exciting underground world are waiting for you!

name: Codedoor
description: In Codedoor, a unique horror puzzle game, you're in an abandoned area with containers, each locked with a random code. Find the right one using the code given to you to survive and advance. Exciting, strategic, and ever-changing challenges await!

name: Furballer
description: Furballer is an arcade game where you take on the role of a puppet football player. Navigate the stage, kicking the ball into the enemy puppets to rack up points and secure the best show. The public will rate your performance live so be sharp, don't miss and keep on kicking ass... or heads !

name: MechAvenger
description: MechAvenger is a fast paced VR shooter and platformer about fighting robots after the end of humanity. Shoot, punch, jump and climb your way through the enemy horde, and shut down their factory.

name: I'll Do It Tomorrow
description: It's Sara's first day of work. However, when she takes the elevator to go to the office, she suddenly finds herself on a mysterious floor. What truth lies behind these weird rooms? Will you be able to move on? Or rather... will you want to move on?

name: Pixelment TD
description: Pixelment TD is an Element based Tower Defense game, You are facing a new tower defense game with unique graphic experience.

name: Cat Palette: Merging Colorful Kittens
description: In this 2D puzzle game you have to mix different colored cats together. "Cat Palette: Merging Colorful Kittens" has 150 handcrafted levels with tons of different and unique fluffy friends!

name: Fairy Carrots
description: Stealth action exploration game in which a "little hater" hides in a shared house where nine girls live and runs around looking for carrots.

name: Boxing School: Solo Career Mode
description: In Boxing School: Solo Career Mode you become a boxer in the 80s. You train, you fight and climb the ranks. Play your own career story from beginner to star. This new expansion puts you into the shoes of a rookie boxer trying to survive.

name: Haunted House
description: "Cheong Wing Mansion" A plot game set in a public housing estate, Prosperous Mansions is an exploration of Hong Kong in the olden days, with elements of ghosts and urban legends. The game is divided into units, each of which has its own story, yet is closely intertwined.

name: Project Coreward
description: Embark on an open world journey across the stars while encountering foes, friends and forgotten stories. Build your ship. Recruit and train your crew. Most of all, explore and confront the unknown to reveal the true, vast nature of choice and consequence.

name: Martha's Dolls
description: Dive into the adventures in " Merphy Town " where Martha's Dolls lives, solve the mystery, prepare yourself for a great horror experience !

name: Buriedbornes 2
description: "The oldest and most abhorrent Prophecy has become reality. This is endless and merciless warfare for Buriedbornes, army can revive forever." The long-awaited sequel to the easy-to-play turn-based dungeon RPG series is finally here!

name: Cyber Sprint
description: Cyber Sprint is all about speedrunning mastery. Players must become adept at navigating the digital landscapes with unparalleled agility, employing a combination of sprinting, sliding, jumping, and wall-running to maintain momentum and shave off precious seconds.

name: CaS-Puz: Camera Surface Puzzle
description: Your perspective changes the world. In this hardcore platformer, the existence of walls depends on the angle of your camera. A seemingly impassable level will transform once you look from a different angle, and every careless jump and camera movement can turn into a flight into the void.

name: Karnal
description: Outnumbered, outgunned, and alone, your only objective is to find your wife. Traverse horrific facilities, city streets, and apartment buildings while fighting various kinds of enemies in this old-school shooter.

name: Get Out Joey!
description: In a dark and stunning world, swing from platform to platform and try to rise to the surface. Thanks to his spear and your agility, make Joey a free man...

name: Sandbox Skyline
description: Build impressive skyscrapers Pixel by Pixel, and protect them from the harsh realities of nature. Each pixel is physically simulated to interact with earthquakes, firestorms, blizzards, and tsunamis. Protect your skyline and expand your territory in this relaxing (yet challenging) sandbox builder.

name: Against Great Darkness
description: Against Great Darkness is a brick breaker roguelike. You are a paragon of pagan mythology trying to escape the clutches of Lucifer. Fight through waves of demonic entities and acquire great relics which aid you on your escape. Stumble upon unique events which can either reward or hinder your ascent. Gather shards on each run to unlock upgrades that will better your chances.

name: Haunt Monster
description: Haunt Monster is third person shooting monster game. Your mission is shoot the monsters that have been mutated. From the offices, warehouses, tunnel and mysterious laboratories have become hiding places for monsters, zombies, ghosts. They are coming, haunting and destroying the city.

name: MOAR: Appeteaser
description:
MOAR - Appeteaser is the sandbox version of Mayhem on a Rainbow - VR which will come in 2023 and is going to have an epic story campaign.
The Appeteser offers endless fun with wave and arena shooters spiced with mini games and an upcoming ingame level builder. Multiplayer is also among future plans.

You will fight a horde of various zombies with different kind of ranged and melee weapons.

You can collect points to unlock new guns, levels and power ups.

It is an easy going fun in which you can jump in any time and enjoy a bit of mayhem.

name: The Sand Knight
description: Kill your foes and power up your mech in this combat-heavy game of destruction and mayhem. Maneuver around the battlefield, avoiding enemy fire while dishing it out in kind.

name: Beer Factory
description: Beer Factory is a business simulation and management game. Take the challenge, manage your own beer factory, employees, production lines, import and export of the merchandise.

name: Progeria: Vae Victis
description: XXI century, Russian Empire. Kirill Yeletsky is a fifth-year student at the Saint Petersburg Academic University of Necromagic. Help him defend the honor of his noble family by winning in the grand imperial necromagic tournament.

name: Despair: Blood Curse
description: A third-person survival horror game featuring non-linear gameplay, puzzles, and enemies from the depths of hell. After the arrival of an unexpected guest back home, Anna's in a race against time to uncover the mystery of the events that took place. Will she save her sister before it's too late?

name: Mary Had A Lost Lamb
description: Mary Had A Lost Lamb is a exploration psychological horror RPG Maker game on a microorganism who is finding her lamb. Do be aware this game is very dialogue heavy.

name: What Must Be Done
description: Knowing what must be done, you venture into the dungeon to start collecting the resources necessary. Who knows where this path will lead...

name: Night Confessional
description:
It was several years before the abolition of the papacy that coin-operated confessionals began to populate the cities.

An interactive fiction piece about a confession booth at the end of the year.

name: NovaX
description: Nova-X is a solo/cooperative survival game currently in development. Immerse yourself in a multiplayer pirate/fantasy world where you can embark on world exploration, conquer territories, build ships, seek treasures, or gleefully indulge in pillaging.

name: Samuza
description: Welcome to the world of SAMUZA! In this time attack obstacle course game, you play as one of the "SAMUZA" series of robots who tries to restore the lost world by finding it's allies.

name: Cat's Cosmic Atlas: Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: AFK Journey
description: AFK Journey is a 3D world-based strategy card Gacha RPG. Continuing from AFK Arena, all aspects of its still active predecessor are improved!

name: Elemental Engagements
description: Wield god powers and command legions of elemental thralls against your friends! Elemental Engagements is a split-screen, versus, real-time-strategy game. Gain favor with the elemental gods to use their 16 powers, battle on 3 maps, and play with either Keyboard or Controller!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: ProTrain The Eastern Range
description: Farming and ranching have always been practiced on the high pastures of the Eastern Range. Covering 21 miles of track, based around the Northern US area, this route includes a four pre-made sessions, and new BN and NS Maersk SD40-2 locomotives.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: ProTrain The Eastern Range
description: Farming and ranching have always been practiced on the high pastures of the Eastern Range. Covering 21 miles of track, based around the Northern US area, this route includes a four pre-made sessions, and new BN and NS Maersk SD40-2 locomotives.

name: Trainz Plus: ProTrain The Eastern Range
description: Farming and ranching have always been practiced on the high pastures of the Eastern Range. Covering 21 miles of track, based around the Northern US area, this route includes a four pre-made sessions, and new BN and NS Maersk SD40-2 locomotives.

name: Last Dino Standing
description: Last Dino Standing is a fast-paced game where you control a T-rex to avoid crazy elements.

name: Obey Your Pirate Queen!
description:
Ever since your parents left to hunt for treasure, things have been quiet at home for you and your sister. The two of you carry your prized dragon scales wherever you go, connecting the two of you even when you’re apart. However, you soon find that this ‘lucky trinket’ of yours holds actual power, and you’re whisked away to a crew of three rambunctious pirates! What could these beautiful ladies want with someone like you?

After begging for your life, the pirate captain decides to grant you mercy. Her rules are easy—follow her orders and you get a shot of finding your sister. Disobey her and walk the plank! If you do what she asks, you may find a special surprise waiting for you at the end of the story.

name: Pultimush
description: Third in a series of short sokoban browser games by the developer of Baba Is You.

name: KinitoPet
description: KinitoPet is a psychological horror experience that takes place through Kinito, an early 2000s virtual assistant. Kinito is able to walk, talk, browse, adapt, and play games as Kinito is like no other with its adaptive technology!

name: We Need More Steam!
description: We Need More Steam! is about strategizing and creating as much electricity as possible for a town's people always demanding more!

name: Blade X: Odyssey of Heroes
description:
Blade X, the sequel to the Blade series which was the first action RPG to surpass 5 million downloads, is known for its spectacular action and smooth controls. Known for its console-like storytelling and high-quality graphics despite being a mobile game, the Blade series previously achieved top rankings on both the App Store and Google Play Store, ranking 1st and 2nd.

Blade X continues the unique world and story of the previous Blade series, offering various content for character growth. Players can engage in story-based Scenario Mode, protect the NPC while fending off monsters in the Guardian Mode, defeat over 30 boss monsters and obtain rewards in the Sealed Relic Tower, and participate in the ranking competition based on character growth progress in the Dimension Gate.
